MultiplexThreeInputInt

This component is used to take multiple input data (in this instance integer data), and present one as the output data depending on the events received. When an event is received, then the data at the corresponding input is presented to the output [Out]o1. For example if an event is received at input [In]1, the data at input [In]i1 is presented at output [Out]o1.

Ports

  • [In] i1:

    Data input 1.

  • [In] i2:

    Data input 2.

  • [In] i3:

    Data input 3.

  • [Out] o1:

    Data output, fires on every event input.

  • [In] 1:

    Event input 1, triggers the presentation of data input [In]i1 to the output [Out]o1.

  • [In] 2:

    Event input 2, triggers the presentation of data input [In]i2 to the output [Out]o1.

  • [In] 3:

    Event input 3, triggers the presentation of data input [In]i3 to the output [Out]o1.

  • [Out] 1:

    Event output, fires on every event input.

Parameters

None.

State Machine

Stateless.

Profiles

All.

Toolbox

Core.

Version

v2.1.

Native Dependencies

  • TDK1.1:

Licence Type

LGPL.

Component Supplier

inx ltd.
